price: 53. « N’aie pas peur, dirent-ils, nous t’annonçons l’heureuse naissance d’un garçon doté d’un grand savoir. »
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
